Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, newspapers and journals, CDs, jigsaws, spoken word cassettes, language tapes and DVDs. Has small exhibition space. Provides 8 People's Network computers (5 for adults, 3 for children) with Microsoft Office, Internet access and a scanner for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-5.30pm, Tues & Fri 9am-5.30pm, Wed 9am-7.30pm, Sat 9am-4pm, Thurs closed (opening times); Mon & Tues 2-2.45pm (under 5's Story Time), Wed 1-3pm (decoupage group), 1st Tues in the month 10.30am-1.30pm (Baby Time, term-time only, must be booked), 1st Wed in the month 9am-12noon (coffee morning), Councillors and MP surgeries, please contact for details
